item.title: Golang之命令行教程
item.description: 一. 命令行预览 Go命令行使用二级命令，格式go <command> [arguments] $ go help Go is a tool for managing Go source code. Usage: go <command> [arguments] The commands are: bug start a bug report build compile packages and dependencies clean remove object files and cached files doc show documentation for package or symbol env print
